title: Complete EDA: Time series with Plotly
description: Complete exploratory data analysisWe will be using pandas, scipy, seaborn and plotly to explore the train.csv data. Interactive plots will be used to visualize the time series since we have many data points. Some key factors about this dataset:  Number of rows: 913k Just three columns: store, item and sales. Fifty different items and ten stores Sales are measured for each item, store and date (daily) Five years time frame (2013/01/01 to 2017/12/31) No missing data  I will be updating this notebook as possible. Please upvote if you find usefull, thanks.
